material.mattext: Let us assume that for a site is used menu with the type "left". If for the site section "About us" there was not created any personal template for menu showing then:
there will be shown no menu in this section
"left" menu of the superposed (parental) site section will be used as the section menu
the section menu will be shown with use of the default menu template
the section menu will be shown with use of the menu template developed for the superposed (parental) site section
